system.description:
Through industry and numbers, Germans have risen as Christendom’s mightiest strain, although what the will of Fate has lifted, it has immediately fractured into a hundred little towns and principalities.

These would be useless to recount, for they include peaceful lands as well as empires teeming with garrisons and blue-uniformed soldiers. Yet all Germans seek to learn the trade of one of their ancestors, and practice it with considerable skill.

Due to their diligence, they learn an extra, randomly rolled Craft skill with a +2 bonus. In this trade, they are already considered journeymen by guild standards, and enjoy all attendant benefits.

Germans can become masters in their craft at 4th level.
